title: Diamond Kasu Pendant - Chandramukhi Design
features: This stunning pendant features a classic Chandramukhi or 'Moon-faced' design meticulously paved with brilliant-cut diamonds. The floral pattern at the center adds a touch of traditional elegance, while the geometric outer framework ensures a contemporary appeal. The diamonds are set in a prong setting to maximize their brilliance. This pendant can be paired with chain of your choice.
description: This exquisite pendant blends modern design sensibilities with timeless elegance. The high-quality diamonds and meticulously crafted gold setting make it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. Its design is versatile enough to complement both traditional and contemporary attire.
